archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0928
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I require the billing system to calculate deferred and accrued revenue (incl. reporting at a customer level).

properties.value: Postpaid and subscription model. Accured: Service provided, cash not yet received (postpaid) Deffered: Money receievd, service not yet provided (subscription)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
